mainText:
I am truly saddened to hear that the world has lost the genius that is  
Steve Jobs. Who else could have created and led such a great company  
which has changed the way we live our lives and made it at times even  
magical!

My condolences to his family, friends and everyone at Apple.

"The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world,  
are the ones who do"

Thank you Steve for daring to be one of the crazy ones.
author: Patrick
